pages.text: The $(mob)Sheep$() is an animal commonly found in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It flees when hit and can be bred using $(item)Wheat$().$(p)It is a good source of food and is mostly used for its $(item)Wool$().

$(mob)Sheeps$() drop $(item)Wool$() on death or when sheared with $(item)Shears$(). $(mob)Sheeps$() will eat $(item)Grass$() on the ground to regrow it if they are sheared.$(p)Using any dye on a $(mob)Sheep$() will permanently color the $(item)Wool$() it gives.
